reporting-org.narrative: Bundesministerium für wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung (BMZ)
Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ)

title.narrative: Program to promote developmental skills training (PFQ) 2021-2023

description.narrative: Mit dem PFQ werden Projekte in Deutschland gefördert, in denen NRO ihre in der Praxis erworbene entwicklungspolitische Fachexpertise im Rahmen von entwicklungspolitischen Qualifizierungsmaßnahmen anderen NROs sowie weiteren interessierten Akteuren, z. B. Kommunen, weitergeben.

The PFQ projects in Germany are encouraged, where NGOs share their acquired in practice developmental specialist expertise within the framework of developmental skills training other NGOs and other interested actors, eg. As municipalities.

The PFQ projects in Germany are encouraged, where NGOs share their acquired in practice developmental specialist expertise within the framework of developmental skills training other NGOs and other interested actors, eg. As municipalities.
